alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:27PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 215 PM PDT... At 127 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Morena, or 7 miles west of I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Cajon, Alpine, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Lake Morena, Descanso, Lake Cuyamaca, Pine Valley, Lakeside, Potrero, Campo, Boulder Creek, Skye Valley, Captain Grande Indian Reservation, Flinn Springs, Viejas Indian Reservation, Barrett Lake, Harbison Canyon, Japatul Valley, Guatay and Dulzura. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
